definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
sum of money raised (in a share subscription)

sentences.english: The foundation was set up to collect funds for the boy.
sentences.chinese: 该基金会的建立是为萨帕马加筹集资金。

sentences.english: They put their money together to glam up the street for Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 为圣诞节他们集资把这条街装饰一新。

sentences.english: Some cooperatives, for example, raise money for research into important crops.
sentences.chinese: 例如，一些合作社筹集资金研究重要农作物。

sentences.english: They are trying by all possible means to raise funds.
sentences.chinese: 法务省准备通过个人集资筹集资金。

sentences.english: They are trying by all possible means to raise funds.
sentences.chinese: 法务省准备通过个人集资筹集资金。

sentences.english: The machine was built with money from the people of more than 20 countries.
sentences.chinese: 该机器由20余国集资建造。

sentences.english: Such loans usually come frompullspools, or collections, of investment money.
sentences.chinese: 这种贷款通常是来自于投资款的集资。

sentences.english: The organization raises money for leukemia and lymphoma research.
sentences.chinese: 那组织为白血病和淋巴瘤研究筹集资金。

sentences.english: Some specific suggestions in the field are also given.
sentences.chinese: 并对集资建路提出一些具体建议。

sentences.english: They are raising a fund in support of this good cause.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在为赞助这一有益的事业而集资。

sentences.english: Elio Motors has a goal of raising funds for a new type of car.
sentences.chinese: 埃利奥汽车公司筹集资金用于一款新型汽车。

sentences.english: They are trying by all possible means to raise funds.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在多方设法筹集资金。

sentences.english: The company also plans to raise money from charitable foundations to lend out, with the interest being reinvested to fund further loans.
sentences.chinese: 这个公司为了放款也计划从慈善基金会筹集资金。

sentences.english: Select from hundreds of fund-raising and the grand prize a blank template.
sentences.chinese: 选择从数以百计的集资和奖励模板空白超大。

sentences.english: If there are problems looming, move early to raise capital.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的公司危机隐现，那么请尽早筹集资金。

sentences.english: Tht's why they're rising money gin for second trip which they hope to mke in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 这是他们为什么筹集资金准备春天再去中国的原因。

definition: to fund/to put money into sth/to invest
to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
